meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Vietnam.
meanings.sent1: In Vietnam, you can buy many things with just one duan.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for duan at the currency exchange.
meanings.sent3: The duan in my pocket jingled happily as I walked.
meanings.sent4: Her savings grew slowly, like a pile of duan stacking up.
meanings.sent5: The shiny duan sparkled in the sunlight, tempting me to spend it.

meanings.sent1: Mr. Duan greeted us warmly with a smile.
meanings.sent2: The Duan family reunion was a joyous occasion.
meanings.sent3: Duan's name was always misspelled as 'Dawn' on official documents.
meanings.sent4: The Duan surname stood out like a rare gem among the common names.
meanings.sent5: The Duan family tree traced back many generations, full of stories and memories.

meanings.definition: A type of poem in Gaelic literature.
meanings.sent1: The bard recited a beautiful duan that moved the audience to tears.
meanings.sent2: I studied the structure of a duan for my Gaelic literature class.
meanings.sent3: The duan danced off the page, painting vivid images in my mind.
meanings.sent4: Her words in the duan wrapped around my heart like a warm embrace.
meanings.sent5: The duan echoed through the hills, carrying tales of old to new ears.
